Haxe/OpenFL will soon be integrated with Flash CC IDE

by Adi Reddy Mora — on haxe, openfl, flash 02 Nov 2014

With the new “Custom platform support” in Flash Professional CC, Haxe/OpenFL will soon be available in Flash IDE which is a great news for Haxe developers.

Look at Joshua Granick’s quick demo showing how it works.

You can skip to Haxe/OpenFL demo which starts at around 25:00.
